ranges.notes: Public holiday, most businesses closed, recovery from New Year's Eve celebrations, winter atmosphere at Markthal
Winter sales begin, cold weather, few tourists, good time for museum visits like Kunsthal and Museum Boijmans Van Beuningen Depot
Major cultural event bringing international filmmakers and cinephiles to the city, multiple venues across Rotterdam
Cold winter weather continues, few tourists, excellent time for museums and indoor attractions
Special menus at restaurants, Euromast offers romantic dining experiences with city views
Contemporary art fair and related exhibitions throughout the city, focus on emerging artists and galleries
Early spring with unpredictable weather, gradual warming, indoor-outdoor activities at covered venues like Markthal
Southern Netherlands tradition with some celebrations in Rotterdam, particularly in neighborhoods like Charlois and Feijenoord
Easter markets, extended shopping hours, special brunches at restaurants across the city
Spring weather improves, tulips and spring flowers throughout city parks, outdoor cafe culture begins
National holiday celebrating the king's birthday, citywide street markets, orange-themed parties, boat parties on the Maas River
Major international marathon through Rotterdam streets with cultural events surrounding the race
Public holiday with demonstrations and events, particularly in working-class neighborhoods
May 4th (Remembrance Day) and May 5th (Liberation Day) commemorate WWII with ceremonies at bombarded city center sites
Celebration of Rotterdam's innovative architecture with special tours, open buildings, and exhibitions
Early summer weather, excellent for outdoor activities, rooftop bars, and waterside dining
Literary events throughout the city celebrating international poetry and spoken word
World-renowned jazz festival at Rotterdam Ahoy, bringing international musical talent and visitors
Colorful Caribbean-inspired festival with street parade, music, and festivities throughout the city
Peak summer weather, outdoor activities very popular at beaches like Hoek van Holland and Maasvlakte
Multicultural festival celebrating Rotterdam's diversity with music, dance, and food
Pleasant late summer weather, perfect conditions for exploring the city, decreased crowds from peak summer
Major maritime festival celebrating Rotterdam's port with ship tours, demonstrations, and harbor activities
Continuation of the major maritime festival celebrating Rotterdam's port with ship tours, demonstrations, and harbor activities
Autumn colors in city parks, pleasant temperatures, cultural season begins at major venues like De Doelen
Quieter tourism period, increasingly cooler weather, transition to indoor activities
Children's lantern processions and door-to-door singing in residential neighborhoods
Pre-holiday atmosphere begins, great time for museums and indoor culture
Traditional Dutch holiday celebration with Sinterklaas arriving by boat at Willemskade along the Maas River
Dutch pre-Christmas celebration with gift exchanges and special treats leading up to December 5th
Holiday markets at Markthal and city center, festive decorations throughout the city, ice skating at Museumpark
Most businesses close by afternoon, special dining at hotels and restaurants
Public holidays, most businesses closed, quiet atmosphere with limited dining options
Post-Christmas period, some markets and decorations remain, limited business hours
Citywide celebrations, fireworks along the Maas River and Erasmus Bridge, special events at nightlife venues

spring: Cherry Blossom Viewing in Kralingse Bos
summer: Beach Days at Hook of Holland
winter: Museum Boijmans Van Beuningen Depot Visits
New Year's Celebrations at Erasmus Bridge

scoreDescription.5: Excellent: Perfect conditions, special events, ideal weather, moderate crowds
scoreDescription.4: Good: Very favorable conditions, pleasant weather, manageable crowds
scoreDescription.3: Average: Standard conditions, typical weather, moderate to high tourism
scoreDescription.2: Below Average: Less ideal conditions, possibly unpleasant weather or very low/high tourism (business closures)
scoreDescription.1: Poor: Unfavorable conditions, extreme weather, overcrowded or very limited activities
